data.name: Agents of Mayhem - Firing Squad Skins Pack
data.detailed_description:
Achieve your Squad goals with three new costumes for everyone’s favorite trigger-happy trio. Scheherazade proves once again she’s no Average Joe. Oni raises hell. Kingpin channels his inner CEO. Collect ‘em all!

Content included:


  • Scheherezade Geo-Skin
  • Oni Geo-Skin
  • Kingpin Geo-Skin
data.about_the_game:
Achieve your Squad goals with three new costumes for everyone’s favorite trigger-happy trio. Scheherazade proves once again she’s no Average Joe. Oni raises hell. Kingpin channels his inner CEO. Collect ‘em all!

Content included:

data.short_description: Achieve your Squad goals with three new costumes for everyone’s favorite trigger-happy trio. Scheherazade proves once again she’s no Average Joe. Oni raises hell. Kingpin channels his inner CEO. Collect ‘em all!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 38 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 12288 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 38 MB available space
